title: Filled Feral Teacup
desc:
Post 2408
*It allures you to drink its contents and  unleash its power to the world, hurting you until you do so.*

- While held, you gain a **Card Shard** ðŸ”¹ every turn.
- When discarded, until the end of your next turn, everyone has 2 turns and the effects of the color <:trinket:1141745128898310144> are in play for the 1st card played.
 - Played cards with <:trinket:1141745128898310144> are immediately put back into your hand but gain the <:wild:1106237191388143838> color. Their effects do activate and it is publicly known both cards that are played.
